key.name: window-width
key.description: The last recorded width of the application window.

key.name: window-height
key.description: The last recorded hight of the application window.

key.name: show-menu-bar
key.description: Whether the menu bar should be displayed.

key.name: toolbar-area
key.description: Where the tool bar is docked.

key.name: show-zoom-slider
key.description: Whether the zoom slider should be displayed.

key.name: max-recent-files
key.description: Maximum number of recent files to keep.

key.name: recent-files
key.description: List of recent files. See the "max-recent-files" to configure the maximum number of recent files to keep.

key.name: restart-animation-when-zooming
key.description: Restart the currently played animation when zooming.

key.name: animation-playback-speed
key.description: The animation playback speed in percentage.

key.name: stop-animation-when-finished
key.description: Whether animations will stop when finished or continue indefinitely.

key.name: zoom-multiplier
key.description: The multiplier to be applied when using the mouse scroll wheel for zooming. This value defines the zooming step used for each scroll event in percentage.
